name: Alter Dogma
description:
2D dungeon RPG has no advertising nor additional payments
Featuring in-depth characters and a solid storyline
4-group formation, strategic exploration and combats
There are multiple endings depending on the player's choices


RPG based on following 'Principles'


This RPG features a 2D dungeon that lets you explore the world and find clues regarding the Tree of Life 'Sacred Tree' by managing the Knights hired by the Order.


Decide on the Knights that you want and lead them by embarking on a journey into an unknown world!


Nurture your Knights with strength, intelligence, vitality, dexterity, agility and luck - six abilities you can distribute strategically to enjoy an extensive type of combat by using nine types of knights and specific operating skills.


Using ten different unique character-related skills and common abilities can be useful in combat.
There are also 106 types of equipment to be used to create the ultimate Knights and face the most difficult ordeals.


Weaponry is not the only answer to getting close to the truth. Explore 'Yigeudeurasil', which is in a state of despair, and continue the game through battles, dialogue and an understanding of the enemy.


You can obtain 'achievements' through various trials and events.
Some are difficult, some are pleasurable, for a total of 26 achievements that will ensure you feel a sense of achievement.


RPG with a 2D dungeon, free from in-app payments and advertising.
You can even play without an Internet connection and avail of the convenient game playing even with one hand only.


Check for official updates through our community and share information between players.


※ The game's Save File is stored in the device. Please note that the saved file disappears when the game is deleted.
(An additional interlock feature will save a file on the server)

※ I felt discouraged by the games currently available, which are repetitive and focused on profit. I thus developed this game by myself, immersed in the nostalgia of the gamer times of my childhood. I have poured all my heart into this game.
